description: Reducing disparities in access to information and services among hinterland communities in Suriname through use of ICT

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: With this project UNDP will be assisting the government to ensure that people living in the interior have access to information and education by making use of ICT solutions.

title: Reducing disparities coastal/interior using ICTs
